basics.name: Akhil Shukla
basics.label: Software Developer at INTEL
basics.summary: Software Developer at INTEL. Have completed Bachelors in Electronics and Communications Engg. (2013 - 2017), and presently pursuing a PGD in Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence from IIIT-B(Dec 2019 - Dec 2020).

courses: Python Programming for Event Handling and Game Development

work.summary: Development of ML based Web APIs
highlights: Responsible for the web api development for listing memories used by several teams in Intel
This Web API is based on a Deep Learning Neural Network Optimizer that optimizes PPA parameters- Power, Performance, Area parameters for a given user input.

work.summary: Modem Layer-1 Firmware Development for 4G/5G Intel modems
highlights: Developed and owned UE Physical layer features for 4g/5g RAT, working primarily on power management, cell search/measurement, resource allocation management for master and slave RATs.
Responsible for code maintenance and defect debugging for self-owned features.
Performed and evaluated Profiling for Code Optimization and MIPS Reduction.
Planning and discussions with customers, global L1CC teams to evaluate design approach towards feature development.
Additionally, developed projects with Quality Initiatives team to help streamline defect assignment to teams.

work.summary: Conformance Testing and Protocol Stacking (CT-PS) Intern
highlights: Planned and executed Conformance Tests on Anite/R&S network simulator test setups.
Tested features like call registration, call processing, supplementary services, Inter-RAT handovers etc.
Enriched knowledge on technologies like 2g, 3g, their protocol stack architectures and GSM, UMTS call flows.

volunteer.summary: Active Volunteer for YRC VIT branch
highlights: Spreading awareness via Campaigns organized in campus

volunteer.summary: Org. IEEE PES tech symposiums, projects

awards.title: Amul Vidya Shree Award
awards.summary: The Amul Vidya Shree Award recognizes and rewards Class X toppers across India.

awards.title: Hindustan Pratibha Samman Medal 2011
awards.summary: Awarded Hindustan Pratibha Samman Gold medal for being the school topper in Class X. A special mention in the Hindustan newspaper too for outstanding performance..
